item.description:
Join me to work begin to off that Thanksgiving Dinner. Check out the Bentley Loop and see how different it looks this time of year.

Wear comfortable warm clothes, good shoes. Bring a snack and water. Be prepared for damp ground or maybe snow! Will hike in the rain but if you won't please cancel the night before. Meet at Parking lot 2 at 9:15 for a 9:30 hike.

Have a great Thanksgiving...me I'm thankful for my FMSSF fellow hikers. Cheers!

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Loop the Bentley Loop
